meta.description: Enforce default parameters to be last

content.introduction:
Enforce default parameters to be last
❄️FrozenThis rule is currentlyfrozenand is not accepting feature requests.
Table of ContentsRule DetailsVersionResources
Putting default parameter at last allows function calls to omit optional tail arguments.
// Correct: optional argument can be omittedfunctioncreateUser(id,isAdmin=false){}createUser("tabby")// Incorrect: optional argument can **not** be omittedfunctioncreateUser(isAdmin=false,id){}createUser(undefined,"tabby")1234567Copy code to clipboard
